TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi UITypeEditor extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可用于设计值编辑器的基类，这些编辑器可提供用户界面 (UI) 以用来表示和编辑所支持的数据类型的对象值。

span.span: Provides a base class that can be used to design value editors that can provide a user interface (UI) for representing and editing the values of objects of the supported data types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个基类，你可以从派生和扩展来实现的设计时环境的自定义类型编辑器。The class provides a base class that you can derive from and extend to implement a custom type editor for the design-time environment. 通常情况下，你自定义类型的编辑器交互控件。Typically, your custom type editor interacts with the control. 自定义类型的编辑器的一个文本框中的值编辑器不足以有效地选择某些类型的值的情况下有用。Custom type editors are useful in situations where a text-box value editor is insufficient to effectively select the values of certain types. 若要实现自定义的设计时 UI 类型编辑器，必须执行以下步骤：To implement a custom design-time UI type editor, you must perform the following steps: - 定义一个从 派生的类。Define a class that derives from . - 重写方法以处理用户界面、 用户输入的处理和赋值。Override the method to handle the user interface, user input processing, and value assignment. - 重写方法，以通知的类型的编辑器样式编辑器将使用属性窗口。Override the method to inform the Properties window of the type of editor style that the editor will use. 你可以添加对通过执行以下步骤来绘制属性窗口中的值的表示形式的额外支持：You can add additional support for painting a value's representation in the Properties window by performing the following steps: - 重写方法，以指示该编辑器支持显示值的表示形式。Override the method to indicate that the editor supports displaying the value's representation. - 重写方法来实现的值的表示形式显示。Override the method to implement the display of the value's representation. - 重写构造函数方法如果编辑器应具有初始化行为。Override the constructor method if the editor should have initialization behavior. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持从右到左 (RTL) 布局。The class does not support right-to-left (RTL) layouts. 有关增强设计时支持的详细信息，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For more information about enhancing design-time support, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). 有关详细信息实现，请参阅[用户接口类型编辑器概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da)。For more information on implementing a , see [User Interface Type Editors Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f068b4ea-6e8c-4c0b-aefd-188b337240da). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示可与整数、 双精度，关联或 float 属性使用为提供于在设计模式下的属性窗口的角度选择接口。The following code example demonstrates that a can be associated with an integer, double, or float property using an to provide an angle selection interface from the Properties window in design mode. 此示例使用接口来在设计模式中的属性窗口中显示的下拉列表控件。This example uses the interface to display a drop-down control in the Properties window in design mode. 编译代码并将该程序集添加到工具箱**自定义工具箱**命令**工具**的 Visual Studio 的菜单。Compile the code and add the assembly to the Toolbox using the **Customize Toolbox** command on the **Tools** menu of Visual Studio. 创建的实例`AngleTestControl`并单击属性窗口使用编辑器将属性配置中的角度属性旁边的下拉列表按钮。Create an instance of the `AngleTestControl` and click the drop-down button next to the Angle property in the Properties window to configure the property using the editor. [!code-cpp[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/CPP/angleeditor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/CS/angleeditor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AngleEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AngleEditor/VB/angleeditor.vb#1)]

span.span: for full access to system resources.

The new value of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启动用户界面以进行编辑值，并在用户尝试编辑此编辑器配置要编辑的值类型的值，属性窗口时调用。This method launches the user interface for value editing, and is called by the Properties window when a user attempts to edit the value of a type that this editor is configured to edit the value of. 因此，编辑器可以获取任何所需的服务提供服务提供程序。A service provider is provided so that the editor can obtain any required services.

span.span: Paints a representation of the value of an object using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑器应绘制指定矩形的边界内。Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle. 将此矩形指示属性窗口来绘制中值的表示形式的区域。This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，由指定的矩形将基于时 app.config 文件包含以下条目系统 DPI 设置调整大小：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑器应绘制指定矩形的边界内。Editors should paint within the boundaries of the specified rectangle. 将此矩形指示属性窗口来绘制中值的表示形式的区域。This rectangle indicates the area of the Properties window to draw a representation of the value within. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，由指定的矩形将基于时 app.config 文件包含以下条目系统 DPI 设置调整大小：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the rectangle specified by will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```
